levels.name: Obstacle Course?
levels.description: Prepare for the thrill of your life!  Watch out for bad things.  This level isn't too hard.  I guess try it out or something.

levels.name: Gut Bus Extreme!
levels.description: Heavily tested with all characters.  Spacebar grabs onto the inside of the bus, helping you stay inside- use sparingly! Grabbing alters the physics and causes unpredictability.  Feel free to make new versions, add vehicles, change jumps, etc.  Give credit to here in credits if you do.

levels.name: BMX_Park II
levels.description: It's back with larger jumps, a massive loop (watch your head), and higher speeds! Keep an eye out for more spikes, landmines, and a new grinder. Enjoy!  -Reuploaded for minor bug fix

levels.name: SnowyMountain*final*
levels.description: Press Z at the start and hold on to the cable-car. 7 different ways to finish, can you find them all?  Enjoy! ;)

levels.name: Dawn of the Dead.lv1
levels.description: *Level 1* Mr. Black worked with you at BioChem labs, until he went mad and dumped a neurotoxin into the towns water supply. The toxin turns people into blood thirsty monsters; luckily you are immune, but you need to release the antidote, save the town, and get revenge. *hint* C4 in your Briefcase

levels.name: IT KEEPS HAPPENING!
levels.description: Abandon your vehicle and swing your way to success.  Remember, after ejecting you can grab onto things with spacebar.   **THIS IS HARD**
